channel.title: Black Mark Delays
channel.description:
This is not particularly about me being banned (Although I'll cover a small part of that).
Jagex's black mark system is incredibly slow. A friend of mine got banned for swearing from three years before hand. I got permanently muted and permanently banned for false accusations of password scamming, then I appealed it and continued with only 2 BM (You get 10 for password scamming :\ ). Anyhow recently I was banned for unpaid membership. I haven't even played RuneScape for six months, I only get on for events.
How long have your black marks been delayed? I personally think Jagex does it to fuck with us :\

item.title: Black Mark Delays
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

OWNER 2007:

Yesterday, I got an offence from 2 and a half years ago…AND IT WAS A JOKE. Jagex needs to get their auto-responsing heads straight.

I really shouldn’t even justify this with a post, but I’m going to. Pics or you’re a lying faggot.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mark Delays
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

[quote=“OWNER 2007, post:15, topic:153723”][quote author=Exception link=topic=210078.msg1870824#msg1870824 date=1194326133]
I got banned the day after I used Yakman’s PK client, which is surprisingly fast. I’ve only used one account with a deob, and that was over six months ago, I got banned on it about a month ago.
[/quote]How the FUCK can you use a client that is not runescape on runescape?!? You need the ip and shit…[/quote]
He is using the runescape client, Yakman’s PK client is a modified runescape deob.

Read full topic
